summary: Item 1. BUSINESS Company Overview At Kenvue, our purpose is to realize the extraordinary power of everyday care. As a global leader at the intersection of healthcare and consumer goods, we are the world’s largest pure-play consumer health company by revenue with $15.5 billion in Net sales in the fiscal year 2024. By combining the power of science with meaningful consumer insights and our digital strategy, we empower consumers to live healthier lives every day. Built on more than a century of heritage and trusted by generations, our differentiated portfolio of iconic brands—including Tylenol ® , Neutrogena ® , Listerine ® , Johnson’s ® , BAND-AID ® Brand, Aveeno ® , Zyrtec ® , and Nicorette ® —is backed by science and recommended by healthcare professionals, which further reinforces our consumers’ connections to our brands.
